content.title: Welcome to DinoDen!
content.text:
Welcome and thanks for playing!
Press F1 to view this menu in the future.
F2 or holding Square / X will open the shop.
Please check out the other tabs that show our rates, information, planned additions, etc.

content.title: Server Rates
content.text:
5x XP
3x Gather
6x Taming (3x rates, but food drains at 2x)
10x Dino mature speed
50% mating cooldown
100x Egg Hatch
3x faster passive tame feedings.
1.5x Resource health
3x Crop Growth
1 week upload expiration
3x Corpse life (90 minutes)
3x Fishing Loot
2x Loot crate quality
10,000+ stack sizes

content.title: Additional Information
content.text:
MoveSpeed is enabled, but you can only put in 10 points on Dinos & 15 points on players. This will be replaced by a better movement system eventually.
Cave Building is on (Read rules)
10x Platform build limits
5x Platform build distance
Anyone can Imprint
CryoFridge allowed everywhere, not required
Flyer Carry allowed

content.title: Game Rules
content.text:
No cheating, exploiting, hacking, bug abusing, etc.
No aggressive dinos outside of your base.
No stealing from others, insiding, etc. If you make a trade or deal you must honor it.
No griefing of any sort!
No excessive bases. Try to keep it to 1 or 2 per map.
No building at any important locations. Examples are :
Artifacts, drops, caves, etc. Everyone must have equal access to these things.
If you build a structure near anything important, it must have a public teleporter and be unlocked.
No excessive building spam / traps. Pick up your traps after you tame!
Public traps in places that warrant them are okay.

content.title: General Rules
content.text:
No hate speech, racism, etc
No bullying or abuse towards any players or admins.
All of these rules are subject to change
This is an 18+ server, so there won't be censorship, but keep it friendly.

content.title: SoonTM
content.text:
- Setting movespeed on a per-flyer basis. Let me know if any ground dinos need changes too.
- I'm going to get more ram for my server soon and add the following maps
- Temptress Lagoon:Enchanted
- Reverence Premium
- Appalachia Premium
- Althemia Premium
- After this, the intent is to get a 2nd server with the same specs so we keep good performance while being able to double the amount of maps.
- Webshop additions
- Additional in game shop / kit additions
- More mods! Including Unrestricted Premium Mods as soon as they are available. 
- More maps! (The plan is to eventually have every map, possible the free + paid versions.)

content.title: Eventually
content.text:
- Our #1 goal is to create the largest clusters & largest collection of clusters.
- We want to create a server for everyone. PvE, PvP, Overhaul mods, ASA, ASE.
- Community Events & more (Bosses, mini games, etc)
- Mutation / breeding / farming events
- Tribe syncing between clusters
- Lootboxes
- Battle pass
- Customized drops
- Quests
- Better dino speed (I plan to remove the points completely and make them faster for each of the 88 after-tame levels)
- Better player speed (Ideally the same as the dino speed above.)
- Default preferences for dinos (Disabling ally looking, follow range, stance, etc)
- Better uploading / downloading features
- PVP Server?
- Primal Chaos Server?
- Primal Nemesis Server?
- Omega Ascended Server?
- Possibly leaderboard for tames / bosses / kills?
